channel.title: Hioos-Scape V1 | AllstarScape REWORKED
channel.description:
Hey There,
[size=12pt]Please leave a comment below ...[/size]
[INTRODUCTION HIOOS-ONLINE] Hioos-online is an allstar-based server, but it has been fully reworked. All skills have been updated like: fully automated(except agility and thieving). This server is still in 'beta'.
NOTE: This server is in BETA, The XP rates are maybe LOW, will fixed. --> Please leave a comment below :)
[size=18pt][client download link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/yer84yqb1q3cqf5/hioos%20client%201.zip]client downloading....[/url] [/size]
[ WORLD EVENT ] --> Made for FUN :). [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/25kn6dx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/hsoump.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2870xp2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/5dv4fs.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/k37tqg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/1zf75h1.png[/img]
[Features in-game]
World event: This is an event which you can earn: - XP lamps. - UNlock over 20 titles - Fast lvl in skills (the skills are low xp). - Fully automatic skills. - Fixed prayer (recharge). - & more more --> look at the pictures.
[size=18pt][client download link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/yer84yqb1q3cqf5/hioos%20client%201.zip]client downloading....[/url] [/size] Pictures:
fletching: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/4tqaur.png[/img]
crafting; [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/258s7jk.png[/img]
farming: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2eey54i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/8ziwjt.png[/img]
mining: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2lat0th.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2m7f2hl.png[/img]
smithing: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/14e06pv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/mrvm82.png[/img]
cooking: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/9hsw49.png[/img]
fishing: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2hn57qw.png[/img]
&& there is soo much more!
blackberry894(herius Owner of Hioos-Online v1)

Thanks anyways for advice.

item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:10, topic:539511”][quote author=Revamp dis Shit link=topic=658351.msg4403745#msg4403745 date=1391274137]

Love what in the world are you talking about

There’s two sentences so which one are you talking about? He’s saying with the first one that the one that he quoted doesn’t make a bit of sense and the other one he is saying that it brings back wonderful, delicious chocolate memories about Allstar but doesn’t want to play the server nonetheless.

im sorry but who seriously plays an allstar to dupe :palm:
[/quote]thought it was a pretty obvious statement my own self…allstars are notorious for dupes most of the time people play them for the nostalgia not to dupe on them just to be an ass.[/quote]
LoveandPower that’s my fucking point! I wanna know why you’re still rambling… who the hell said anything about logging in just to dupe and be an ass? … holy shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Hioos-Scape V1 | AllstarScape REWORKED
item.dc:creator: @BlackBerry_894 BlackBerry 894
item.description:
@BlackBerry_894 wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:9, topic:539511”]Played for like half an hour, and will play more later on.

Feedback:

Smithing isn’t working.
You can’t spend the points anywhere.
The tree has to grow, though the fishspot is straight available.
And you can gain more xp from iron rocks in a x amount of time then enriched rocks. :palm:[/quote]

Hey,

Smithing works. (–> skills than teleport to mining & smithing )
Yes, the armadylean tree has to grow, but it stands longer than the fishing spot(–> It’s moves to another spot after serval time).
iron rocks doesn’t give more XP, than the enriched rock spot.

BlackBerry 894

Read full topic
